description: This chapter focuses on Naomi's counsel for Ruth to approach Boaz at the threshing floor, Ruth's nighttime encounter with Boaz at his feet, Boaz's kind response and promise, and the revelation of a nearer kinsman who has the first right of redemption.

questions.question: What did Naomi ask Ruth?
options: My daughter, shall I not seek rest for thee, that it may be well with thee?

questions.question: How did Naomi address Ruth?
How did Naomi describe Boaz's relationship to them?
options: Is not Boaz of our kindred

questions.question: What would Boaz be doing tonight according to Naomi?
options: He winnoweth barley to night in the threshingfloor

questions.question: What did Naomi tell Ruth to do first?
options: Wash thyself therefore, and anoint thee, and put thy raiment upon thee

questions.question: Until when should Ruth not make herself known to Boaz?
options: Until he shall have done eating and drinking

questions.question: What should Ruth do when Boaz lies down?
options: Thou shalt mark the place where he shall lie, and thou shalt go in, and uncover his feet, and lay thee down

questions.question: Who would tell Ruth what she should do according to Naomi?
options: He will tell thee what thou shalt do

questions.question: How did Ruth respond to Naomi's counsel?
options: All that thou sayest unto me I will do

questions.question: What did Ruth do?
options: She went down unto the floor, and did according to all that her mother in law bade her

questions.question: How was Boaz's condition after he had eaten and drunk?
Where did Boaz go to lie down?
options: At the end of the heap of corn

questions.question: How did Ruth approach and what did she do?
options: She came softly, and uncovered his feet, and laid her down

questions.question: When did Boaz become afraid and turn himself?
What did Boaz see when he turned?
options: A woman lay at his feet

questions.question: What did Boaz ask?
How did Ruth identify herself?
What did Ruth request from Boaz?
options: Spread therefore thy skirt over thine handmaid

questions.question: How did Ruth address Boaz's role?
options: For thou art a near kinsman

questions.question: By whom did Boaz say Ruth should be blessed?
options: Blessed be thou of the LORD

questions.question: Which of Ruth's kindness did Boaz say was greater?
options: Thou hast shewed more kindness in the latter end than at the beginning

questions.question: Who did Ruth not follow according to Boaz?
options: Young men, whether poor or rich

questions.question: What did Boaz tell Ruth not to do?
options: And now, my daughter, fear not

questions.question: What promise did Boaz make to Ruth?
options: I will help you a little
I will do to thee all that thou requirest
I will do what I can

questions.question: What did all the city know about Ruth according to Boaz?
options: That thou art a virtuous woman

questions.question: What did Boaz acknowledge about himself?
options: It is true that I am rich
It is true that I am thy near kinsman
It is true that I am good
It is true that I am a relative

questions.question: Who else did Boaz mention?
options: There is a kinsman nearer than I

questions.question: What did Boaz tell Ruth to do for the night?
What would happen if the nearer kinsman agrees to marry Ruth?
options: Let him do the kinsman's part

questions.question: What would Boaz do if the nearer kinsman refuses?
options: Then will I do the part of a kinsman to thee
He will think about what to do

questions.question: By whose life did Boaz make his oath?
How long did Ruth lay at his feet?
When did Ruth rise up?
What did Boaz say should not be known?
options: Let it not be known that a woman came into the floor

questions.question: What did Boaz tell Ruth to bring and hold?
options: Bring your hand and hold it
Bring the vail that thou hast upon thee, and hold it
Bring a cloth and hold it
Bring a handkerchief and hold it

questions.question: How much barley did Boaz measure out?
What did Naomi ask when Ruth came to her?
Why did Boaz give Ruth the six measures of barley?
options: For he said to me, Go not empty unto thy mother in law

questions.question: Until when did Naomi tell Ruth to wait?
options: Until thou know how the matter will fall

questions.question: What did Naomi say about the man?
options: The man will not be in rest, until he have finished the thing this day
He will be thinking about it
